jam.plot
Class Display

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  jam.plot.Display
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.util.Observer, java.io.Serializable
public final class Display
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer

This class is a display routine for plots. It is implemented by Display.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
0.5 April 98
Author:
Ken Swartz
See Also:
Graphics, Serialized Form
